casebody.data:
No. 842,

Misc.

Bullock v. South Carolina. Petitioner pro se. Daniel R. McLeod, Attorney General of South Carolina, and Wm. H. Smith, Jr., Assistant Attorney General, for respondent.

Motion for leave to proceed in forma pauperis and petition for writ of certiorari to the Supreme Court of South Carolina granted. Case transferred to the appellate docket.
